messages.subject: new list for newer unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: The following isn t my list, and I m not on it.  I m just making the announcement because I think it s a good idea!!
messages.messageBody:
The following isn't my list, and I'm not on it. I'm just making the
announcement because I think it's a good idea!!


http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingBasics/

From the webpage:

Unschooling Basics

A list designed for those new to the philosophy of unschooling. Ask
experienced unschoolers all those niggling questions, and find out how unschooling
works in real families.

If you're familiar with John Holt's work, but unsure of how to begin or what
an unschooling day really looks like, this is a place for you to
discuss,question, ponder and become deeply familiar with natural learning and how it
affects our entire lives. From parenting issues to learning from the whole wide
world and beyond, come explore the issues that unschooling families have dealt
with in the past and how to get beyond "school-think" to a joyful unschooling
lifestyle!


----------

SO if anyone here is feeling crowded on this list by the experiences of
people who've been unschooling a long time, that might be a place to get more basic
info.

I'll warn you though, It's RenA and KellyL and they're more radical than I
am, I think. <g>

While I'm promoting other lists and info,
here's a collection and if any of you know good lists to add to that, write
to me on the side at SandraDodd@....

http://sandradodd.com/lists/other

And don't forget
www.unschooling.com
(message boards especially!)

and
sandradodd.com/unschooling

Sandra
